dct_title_s: Recentissima novi orbis sive Americae septentrionalis et meridionalis tabula; ex officina Caroli Allard, cum privilegio ordinum Hollandiae et Westfrisiae; Ph. Tideman, del.; G. v. Gouwen, sculp.
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. Inset of New Zealand. Decorative cartouche showing native woman adorned in gold jewelry, native man with a bowl of gold nuggets, and various animals. 1 map: hand col., mounted on cloth; 49 x 58 cm.
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library. https://www.lib.umich.edu/about-us/policies/copyright-policy
